radiographic_examinations.findings: Tiny atelectatic foci at the lung bases posteriorly unchanged from prior CTA chest, no worrisome nodules at the lung bases. Clips in the gallbladder fossa compatible with prior cholecystectomy. Normal liver, spleen, splenule, adrenal glands, pancreas, and kidneys. Short segment of bowel wall thickening with pericolonic fat stranding and diverticulosis at the proximal transverse colon, equivocal evidence for tiny extraluminal gas adjacent to the area of inflammation. Additional areas of colonic diverticulosis noted along the cecum and sigmoid colon. Posterior exophytic fibroid along the uterus. Trace free fluid in the pelvis.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Tiny atelectatic foci at the lung bases unchanged from prior study.
